memberdef.name: INPUT_VARS
memberdef.initializer: struct jpeg_source_mgr * datasrc = (cinfo)->src; \ const JOCTET * next_input_byte = datasrc->next_input_byte; \ size_t bytes_in_buffer = datasrc->bytes_in_buffer

memberdef.name: INPUT_2BYTES
memberdef.initializer: MAKESTMT( MAKE_BYTE_AVAIL(cinfo,action); \ V = ((unsigned int) GETJOCTET(*next_input_byte++)) << 8; \ MAKE_BYTE_AVAIL(cinfo,action); \ V += GETJOCTET(*next_input_byte++); )
